medical_history.chief_complaint: Sharp pain in the abdomen, migrating from the belly button to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) and eventually to the back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began this morning around 11am, was sharp and continuous, and progressed to the RLQ before moving to the back. Patient presented to the emergency department at 6pm.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past Medical History: none, Past Surgical History: wisdom teeth removal, tonsillectomy.
